name: Dead Men Rising
description:
The world has ended. A deadly virus wiped out most of the human population and turned them into zombies. Now, only a few people are still alive, fighting for their survival.

Choose one of five survivors to battle hordes of undead as, each with their own unique benefits and weaknesses. With five different map types and a number of varying layouts, you can choose your arena!

See how long you can last with multiple weapons to purchase and many, many zombies to kill!
